AND company_code = #{companyCode}
AND DATE_FORMAT(now_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(now_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
